blogPost.excerpt: MyEdu is an edu-tech firm that provides communication software solutions and apps for assisting school teachers, parents, as well as students. MyEdu's apps also help teachers in managing day-to-day activities in the most efficient way possible.
blogPost.body: MyEdu is an edu-tech firm that provides communication software solutions and apps for assisting school teachers, parents, as well as students. MyEdu's apps also help teachers in managing day-to-day activities in the most efficient way possible.
blogPost.title: MyEdu - School management software
blogPost.author: Avinash Shah

localize.description: MyEdu是一家教育科技公司，提供通讯软件解决方案和应用程序，以协助学校教师、家长以及学生。MyEdu的应用程序也帮助教师以最有效的方式管理日常活动。
MyEdu是一家教育科技公司，提供通訊軟件解決方案和應用程序，以協助學校教師、家長以及學生。MyEdu的應用程序也幫助教師以最有效的方式管理日常活動。
